Dark Atlas: Infernum introduces players to a psychological horror adventure set within a shattered reality, where the boundaries between the physical and mental worlds have collapsed. Developed by Night Council Studio, the game presents a haunting journey through fear and memory.

Story and Setting

Players take on the role of Natalia Asensio, Grand Master of an ancient esoteric order, as society unravels with the appearance of ghosts and the breakdown of dimensional barriers. Trapped, drugged, and struggling to recall her identity, Natalia mu
title: Dark Atlas Infernum – Gameplay Reveal Trailer

EA Sports College Football 26 has been officially revealed, bringing a new era of college football gaming with a range of features and enhanced gameplay options designed for fans of the sport. The game aims to immerse players in the journey from high school recruit to college legend, emphasizing both individual and team development.

Gameplay Overview

Players can take control of their own career or lead their favorite college football team to glory. The game introduces thousands of new plays and an expanded roster of athletes, allowing for deeper stra
title: College Football 26 – Reveal Trailer

Nikoderiko: The Magical World expands its reach with the announcement of physical retail and collector's editions, offering platforming fans a new way to experience this vibrant adventure.

Story and Setting

The game follows Niko and Luna, two treasure-hunting mongooses, as they set out to save a magical island from the villainous Baron Grimbald. Players will journey through a variety of imaginative environments, encountering unique characters and facing off against formidable foes.

Gameplay and Features
title: Nikoderiko: The Magical World – Box Announcement Trailer

PowerWash Simulator has launched its concluding content update, The Muckingham Files Part 6, offering players a final set of cleaning challenges to tackle. Developed by FuturLab Limited, the game is known for its relaxing gameplay focused on washing away grime in a variety of settings.

New Cleaning Locations

The Muckingham Files Part 6 introduces two new jobs for players:

  • Scrub down a Subway Train, ensuring every door and exit is spotless.
  • Clean up the Sculpture Park, including unique pieces like a Mo
title: PowerWash Simulator – The Muckingham Files Part 6 Launch Trailer

Death Stranding 2: On The Beach is set for a high-profile game premiere at The Orpheum Theatre in Los Angeles on June 8, 2025. This event will provide fans with an in-depth look at the sequel to the acclaimed post-apocalyptic adventure, led by visionary developer Hideo Kojima.

Story and Setting

The sequel continues the journey of Sam Porter Bridges, portrayed by Norman Reedus. Returning characters include Elle Fanning as Tomorrow and Léa Seydoux as Fragile. Players can expect a post-apocalyptic o
title: DEATH STRANDING 2: ON THE BEACH – Game Premiere – Orpheum Theatre – June 8, 2025
